name: DataLeak
description: Case template for managing data breach incidents.
author: Jes√∫s Angosto
summary: Investigation and mitigation of a data breach.

tasks.title: Identify compromised data
tasks.description: Determine the scope of the breach by listing affected data and systems.

tasks.title: Contain the breach
tasks.description: Secure compromised systems and prevent additional unauthorized access.

tasks.title: Perform forensic analysis
tasks.description: Analyze systems and logs to identify the root cause and attack vector.

tasks.title: Notify affected parties
tasks.description: Inform individuals and authorities of the breach according to legal and compliance obligations.

tasks.title: Improve security controls
tasks.description: Apply corrective measures and strengthen the security posture to avoid future leaks.

tasks.title: Capture lessons learned
tasks.description: Review the incident response and update internal procedures to improve future readiness.

notes.title: Compromised data
notes.content: Details about the data exposed during the breach.

notes.title: Root cause
notes.content: Summary of the root cause identified during the investigation.

notes.title: Notification
notes.content: Record of notifications sent to affected parties and authorities.

notes.title: Lessons learned
notes.content: Actions and recommendations from the post-mortem review.
